title.v: Chọn phiếu yêu cầu lĩnh vật tư

action.text:
&FlowMultiTagRowRequest; declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000) select top 0 tr.id, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(a.ma_kho) as ma_kho, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri,rtrim(a.ma_lo) as ma_lo, rtrim(b.tk_vt) as tk_vt, b.nhieu_dvt,he_so, a.so_luong as ton13,b.lo_yn,0 as vi_tri_yn &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d87$000000 a cross join dmvt b
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(a.ma_kho) as ma_kho, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri,rtrim(a.ma_lo) as ma_lo, rtrim(b.tk_vt) as tk_vt, b.nhieu_dvt,he_so,0 ,b.lo_yn,case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmvitri where dmvitri.ma_kho = a.ma_kho) then 1 else 0 end as vi_tri_yn &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d87$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt '
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end &FlowMultiUpdateCurrentStock; update #d set ton13 = ton13 / case when he_so <> 0 then he_so else 1 end
select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
